attributes.action: allow authorities to seize monies, goods and articles gained as a result of illegal activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Officers appointed to enforce legislation (police, local authorities etc) should be allowed to seize monies, goods and articles which have been gained by offenders due to their illegal actions. Such goods and articles should be destroyed or put to good community use. Monies should be put into a central fund for the compensation of those harmed by such illegal activities.
